name: BrokenHourglass
description:
Time is broken, you think you want to move but for 10 seconds what you input is only recorded, and will be played the 10 next seconds. Beat the levels. There are only 3.

Did not have time to add everything I wanted but at least the gameplay base is there.

Arrows to Move, spacebar to do a circular attack

Assets from here https://pixel-poem.itch.io/dungeon-assetpuck
